name: Retraining Capabilities
description: Degree to which the system supports retraining and adaptation to new data or conditions.

values.name: Continuous Automated Retraining
values.description: Continuous and automated retraining triggered by performance degradation, concept drift, or new data, with minimal human intervention.

values.name: Automated Pipeline
values.description: Automated retraining pipeline in place, allowing for regular updates with new data and model improvements.

values.name: Manual Retraining
values.description: Manual retraining possible, but infrequent and time-consuming, with limited automation.

values.name: None
values.description: No capability to retrain the model, or retraining requires significant manual effort and downtime.
